languages.text: С неприятным удивлением я осознаю, что Жертве ведом мой стиль рукопашной схватки. Она прикрывает те уязвимые места, которые я люблю взрезать своими мономолекулярными когтями. Но это знание не спасет мою добычу от гибели!

I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!
languages.original_text: С неприятным удивлением я осознаю, что Жертве ведом мой стиль рукопашной схватки. Она прикрывает те уязвимые места, которые я люблю взрезать своими мономолекулярными когтями. Но это знание не спасет мою добычу от гибели!

traits.locale_text: I am unpleasantly surprised when I realize the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

I am unpleasantly surprised when I realize the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

languages.text: 獲物が私の戦闘の流儀を知っていることに気づいたとき、不愉快な驚きを覚えた。私が好んで単分子の爪で切り裂く脆弱化した部分まで熟知しているのだ。しかし、この知識があるからといって、獲物が死を免れることはない！
languages.original_text: I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

traits.locale_text: 獲物が私の戦闘の流儀を知っていることに気づいたとき、不愉快な驚きを覚えた。私が好んで単分子の爪で切り裂く脆弱化した部分まで熟知しているのだ。しかし、この知識があるからといって、獲物が死を免れることはない！

languages.text: 猎物已经察觉到我的战斗风格，这不禁让我大吃一惊。它牢牢地护住了那些脆弱的部位，避开我致命的单分子利爪。但即便如此，它也必须死在这里！
languages.original_text: I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

traits.locale_text: 猎物已经察觉到我的战斗风格，这不禁让我大吃一惊。它牢牢地护住了那些脆弱的部位，避开我致命的单分子利爪。但即便如此，它也必须死在这里！

languages.text: Es una sorpresa desagradable que la presa conozca mi estilo de combate. Conoce los puntos vulnerables que me gusta diseccionar con mis garras monomoleculares, ¡pero eso no la salvará de la muerte!
languages.original_text: I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

traits.locale_text: Es una sorpresa desagradable que la presa conozca mi estilo de combate. Conoce los puntos vulnerables que me gusta diseccionar con mis garras monomoleculares, ¡pero eso no la salvará de la muerte!

languages.text: Ich bin unangenehm überrascht, als ich erkenne, dass die Beute meinen Kampfstil kennt. Sie bedeckt die verletzlichen Schwachstellen, die ich gerne mit meinen monomolekularen Klauen aufschneide. Doch dieses Wissen wird sie nicht vor dem Tod bewahren!
languages.original_text: I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

traits.locale_text: Ich bin unangenehm überrascht, als ich erkenne, dass die Beute meinen Kampfstil kennt. Sie bedeckt die verletzlichen Schwachstellen, die ich gerne mit meinen monomolekularen Klauen aufschneide. Doch dieses Wissen wird sie nicht vor dem Tod bewahren!

languages.text: Je suis désagréablement surpris de voir que la proie semble connaître mon style de combat et couvre les points faibles que je prends d'ordinaire plaisir à trancher de mes griffes monomoléculaires. Mais ce n'est pas ça qui la sauvera !
languages.original_text: I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

traits.locale_text: Je suis désagréablement surpris de voir que la proie semble connaître mon style de combat et couvre les points faibles que je prends d'ordinaire plaisir à trancher de mes griffes monomoléculaires. Mais ce n'est pas ça qui la sauvera !

languages.text: Av'ın dövüş stilim konusunda bilgili olduğunu görmek benim için tatsız bir sürpriz oluyor. Monomoleküler pençelerimle kesmeye çalıştığım savunmasız noktaları koruyor. Ancak bu bilgi onu ölmekten kurtaramayacak!
languages.original_text: I am unpleasantly surprised when I realise the Prey is aware of my combat style. It covers the vulnerable spots I like to cut open with my monomolecular claws. But this knowledge will not save it from death!

traits.locale_text: Av'ın dövüş stilim konusunda bilgili olduğunu görmek benim için tatsız bir sürpriz oluyor. Monomoleküler pençelerimle kesmeye çalıştığım savunmasız noktaları koruyor. Ancak bu bilgi onu ölmekten kurtaramayacak!
